modName: Skyrim Fall of the Space Core Vol. 1 - DELETED
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#93c47d][size=6]Fall of the space core
[color=#f1c232][size=5]Vol. 1![/size][/color][/size][/color][/font][/center][/u][color=#ffff00]This pretty mod ads space core.
Space core speak russian and names of items and locations for items and actions of mod just renamed into russian.
This is mod for limited time so download fast! Nexus can remove it,idk why nexus removing dreamed files of other.
[color=#cc4125]Nexus,WHY?!!![/color]
[u]Enjoy the mod!
[/u][/color][/b]__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[b][color=#00ffff]Location of space core?[/color][/b]
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#6d9eeb][i]Near the tower where you defeated your first dragon. In ruins of little house will start script and then space core says:,, SPAAAAAACE!!!!! ''
[color=#ffffff]__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[/color][/i][b][color=#ffffff][color=#00ffff]Where is atonarch forge?
[color=#ffffff]__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[/color][/color][/color][/b][i]At College of Winterhold in The Midden[/i][/color]
author: Valve and Bethesda
